title: Why cant i post ?
body: Im level 11 now, i should be able to comment and post, but it says "you must be level 7 or blah blah". When i checked, im still level 3 on boards. Why ?

replies.body: Looks up to date now!  Sometimes it takes a bit for an account to sync up to the boards.  Let me know if you still have any issues posting!
Aight, its cool now. Thank you for your response !
